thread.title: Back to the Future Day: Doc Brown has a special message for you
thread.title_full: Back to the Future Day: Doc Brown has a special message for you | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Back to the Future Day: Doc Brown has a special message for you
text:
Back to the Future is now the present and social media is abuzz.
Wednesday marked October 21, 2015, the date Marty McFly and Doc Brown set as their destination.
>> Read more trending stories
Though most of the movie's predictions 26 years ago didn't come true (we're looking at you, flying cars and self-tying sneakers), the movie came close on one thing: the Cubs are in the playoffs. Now we just have to wait and see if they actually take the title.
In honor of Back to the Future Day, Doc Brown delivered a very special message to fans everywhere.
10/21/15! The Future is NOW! Doc Brown has a special message just for you. #BTTF2015
Posted by Back to the Future Trilogy on Tuesday, October 20, 2015
